dmca.title: Notice ID: 167-78804 Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: digitalplayground-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
[mailto:digitalplayground-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, October 04, 2006 4:25 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notice ID: 167-78804 Copyright Infringement
Subject: Notice ID: 167-78804 Copyright Infringement


-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Theplanet.Com Internet Services

Re:  Unauthorized Use of Digital Playground, Inc. Property

Notice ID:167-78804
Notice Date:4 Oct 2006 21:24:36 GMT


Dear Sir or Madam:

Digital Playground, Inc. and its affiliated companies (collectively,
"Digital Playground") are the exclusive owners of copyrights in motion
pictures.

It has come to our attention that Theplanet.Com Internet Services is the
service provider for the IP address listed below, from which
unauthorized copying and distribution (downloading, uploading, file
serving, file "swapping" or other similar activities) of  Digital
Playground's property is taking place.  The documentation included at
the end of this notice specifies the location of the infringement.  We
believe that the Internet access of the user engaging in this
infringement is provided by Theplanet.Com Internet Services or a
downstream service provider who purchases this connectivity from
Theplanet.Com Internet Services.  

This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright
infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act.  Depending
upon the type of service Theplanet.Com Internet Services is providing to
this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does
not expeditiously remove or disable access to the property listed below,
or if it fails to implement a policy that provides for termination of
subscribers who are repeat infringers (see, 17 U.S.C. 512).  

Although various legal and equitable remedies may be available to
Digital Playground as a result of such infringement, Digital Playground
believes that the entire Internet community benefits when these matters
are resolved cooperatively.  We urge you to take immediate action to
effect removal of the detected infringement listed in the attached
report, including:

(1) Notify the account holder of this infringement
(2) Require the account holder remove the infringing material
(3) Disable access to the infringing material
(4) Take appropriate action against the account holder under your Abuse
Policy/Terms of Service

We appreciate your efforts toward this common goal.  Please send us a
prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this
matter.  Please reference the above noted Notice ID 167-78804in all
correspondence, which should be directed to :

Email: mailto:digitalplayground@copyright-compliance.com
?subject=RE%3A%20Notice%20ID%3A%20167%2D78804%20Copyright%20Infringement

or
http://webreply.baytsp.com/webreply/webreply.jsp?customerid=167&commhash
=a09ae14be771af0d24f696d504fda5d8

The undersigned has a good faith belief that use of Digital Playground's
property in the manner described herein is not authorized by Digital
Playground, its agents or the law.  Also, we hereby state, under penalty
of perjury, under the laws of the State of California and under the laws
of the United States, that the information in this notification is
accurate and that the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of
Digital Playground with respect to this matter.

Please be advised that this letter is not and is not intended to be a
complete statement of the facts or law as they may pertain to this
matter or of Digital Playground's positions, rights or remedies, legal
or equitable, all of which are specifically reserved.  

Regards,


Compliance
BayTSP, Inc. ::
PO Box 1314 - Los Gatos, CA 95031
ph: 408-341-2300  fx:  408-341-2399
digitalplayground@copyright-compliance.com

[A pgp public key is available on the key server at
ldap://keyserver.pgp.com if you would like to verify the authenticity of
this notice.]

Evidentiary Information:
Notice ID:167- 78804
Asset: Island Fever 4
Protocol: Web
IP Address:  74.52.97.147
DNS: 93.61.344a.static.theplanet.com
File Name: http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=106598
File Size: 1
Timestamp: 4 Oct 2006 18:49:14 GMT
Last Seen Date: 4 Oct 2006 18:49:14 GMT
URL: http://forum.anothersite.co.uk/showthread.php?t=106598
Username (if available):
